features: Smooth and soften skin with Neutrogena Skin Balancing Purifying Gel Cleanser with 2% Polyhydroxy Acid (PHA) for normal & combination skin

Purifying & conditioning face wash contains dermatologist-grade 2% polyhydroxy acid (PHA), a powerful liquid exfoliant and moisturizing humectant in one. It decongests down to the pores while conditioning skin

PHA gel cleanser targets 100% of pore-clogging dirt and impurities while smoothing and softening skin. It is ideal for normal & combination skin types and is effective for cleansing before & after wearing your mask
This hypoallergenic formula is developed with dermatologists and respects skin's natural pH and moisture barrier
Purifying gel face wash is formulated to be paraben-free, soap-free, sulfate-free, phthalate-free, alcohol-free, and dye-free. Recyclable bottle is made with 30% postconsumer recycled plastic
body.description: Remove pore-clogging dirt and impurities while smoothing and softening skin with Neutrogena Skin Balancing Gel Cleanser. From a dermatologist-recommended brand in skincare and ideal for normal and combination skin, this purifying face wash targets 100% of pore-clogging dirt and impurities while conditioning skin. With a hypoallergenic formula developed with dermatologists that respects skin's natural pH and moisture barrier, this smoothing and softening gel facial cleanser contains 2% polyhydroxy acid (PHA), a powerful liquid exfoliant and moisturizing humectant in one. The smoothing & balancing cleanser is paraben-, soap-, sulfate-, phthalate-, alcohol-, and dye-free. To use, wet face, then apply cleanser to hands. Work into a lather and then massage over face gently. Rinse thoroughly. This daily face wash is effective for cleansing before & after wearing your mask.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Skin Balancing Gel Cleanser For Combination Skin The one that purifies + softens. Meet the perfect match for normal to combination skin! With gentle PHA, this gel cleanser goes beyond clean–exfoliating and conditioning skin at the same time. This hypoallergenic formula respects skin’s natural pH while smoothing and softening skin into perfect balance. 2% polyhydroxy acid (PHA)Targets 100% of dirt & impuritiesFormulated without parabens, soaps, sulfates, phthalates, alcohols + dyes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a great product.
reviews.reviewText: I have really enjoyed this cleanser. I use it for double cleansing. I use a makeup remover wipe or makeup remover balm, then this wash. I use the first cleanse/wipe to get the makeup off. Then I follow with this cleanser.I feel it removes any makeup left over and it helps to exfoliate my face/neck area. I then use glycolic acid toner I have noticed a decrease in my melasma, fine lines and my skin glows. This cleanser is terrific.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Maternity face wash
reviews.reviewText: This has been my go to for pregnancy oil glow-up. I recommend to all my friends. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on April 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Been looking for this just about every where and the places I did find it, it was expensive. So glad I was able to find it her and for a lower price also. I love how it makes my face feels after using and the next morning. Well worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I've been using this for about a month
reviews.reviewText: And I like how it makes my skin feel. I will likely continue using it after this bottle runs out. (My skin has tended to be somewhat dry, and I've dealt with hormonal acne as an adult.)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this face wash!
reviews.reviewText: It’s super gentle but leaves your skin feeling really clean, I love using this product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Where has this been all my life
reviews.reviewText: I wish this product was around in my teens. I’m unfortunately an adult who suffers from hormonal acne still and this stuff has been the only thing to keep it in check. Keeps my combination skin soft and clear if I keep up on it :)
It was very nice, you have to twist the cap to use it and then can close it again for better usage. You just need a pump for each wash and is very easy to form a lather. Overall it's good.
